p: The samples for UPLC-ESI-MS were prepared by dilution from the original concentrations of the extracts to a final volume of 500 μL. In detail, the initial geranium leaves’ extract, 5.00 mg/mL, was diluted to a final concentration of 4.75 mg/mL, and the rose petals’ extract was diluted to a final concentration of 25 mg/mL from the original 50 mg/mL. Both samples included 50 μL 1% formic acid in a final volume of 500 μL.
